headline: KeyCorp (NYSE:KEY) Announces US$1 Billion Share Buyback Despite 14% Dip Over Last Month
summary: KeyCorp (NYSE:KEY) recently announced a $1 billion share buyback plan, reflecting its confidence in financial health and a strategy to enhance shareholder value. Despite this, the company's share price fell 14% over the past month. This decline was influenced by broader market volatility, as major indices like the Dow and S&P 500 faced sharp losses due to increased tariff threats, raising recession fears. The challenging macroeconomic backdrop may have overshadowed KeyCorp's buyback news,...

headline: As Part of Bicentennial Celebration, KeyBank Foundation Launches Grant Program for Community Development Financial Institutions
summary: CLEVELAND, OH / ACCESS Newswire / April 7, 2025 / KeyBank: Program is designed to strengthen Community Development Financial Institutions (CDFIs) that play a critical role in advancing affordable housing and small business development In celebration ...
